content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Pakal samayatthe addhvaananga llil ninnu nyangallude shareeram viramikkukayum, laukikachintakallilninnu nyangallude manassu pinvaangukayum cheythukondu ee sandhyaasamayatthu shaantamaayi thirusannidhiyil nilako nd. Nithyasthuthikallum thudarchayaaya sthothrangallum ninakkarppi kkuvaanum nyangallude jeevane samrakshichu nayikkunnavanum nyangallude aathmaakkallude sahaayiyum rakshithaavumaaya ninte krpaykku sthuthi paaduvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Nyangall ninakku sthuthiyum sothravum karettunnu. Hosho...

Svargatthodum ninnodum
Pizhacheythee nyaan-pokki suthapadavi
Koolikkaaranu samamenne-
Yettadiyaanaay-nirtthuka nin veettil

Snehasametham vishvaasatthode
Mrthiye rodhicho-raharon thandhoopam pole
Kaikkolllluka naathhaa! Nyangallanachori dhoopam.

Kartthaave! Sthuthithe! - nin sthuthi vaanilumoozhiyilum
Ninne sthuthi cheyu vaanavaroppam maanavarum

Thalavan maalaakha-shlomo daaveedin thanaya-
Yakkeki chonnaanen-naathhan thannudayam ninnil

Nalnibiyanmaare!-svargasutha shleehanmaare!
Paapaabdhiyiladiyaar-mungaayvaan praarththhichiduvin
Nal sahadenmaare!-svargaadhipadaasanmaare!
Durgam sangketham ningade praarththhana nyangallkk

Naathhan mozhikallil vishvasthan
Enne villippin nyaan-uttharamarullaam muttukilnyaa-
Nettaam vaathil thurannennallo nin vaagdaanam

Naathhaa! Nin sharane mrtharaayorkkaayu nalkaname.
Mannil sabhayithilum meloorishilemilumormma

Moraaneshumashihaa......
Naathhaa! Ninthanuvum ninavum-kondor nyangall
Vidhiyum prathikaaravumelkkaa-thaparaadhakshama kandetthi
Pparichodu ninte valamaayu nilakondeedaname.
Haaleluyyaa-mukhadeepthiyodum

Dishanaalilumaaraadhakare mudichoodicha
Raajaavaam mashihaa sthuthyan-dayaraapallllikallennivayil
Daaveedaakum-kinnaramathinaal keertthithanaam
Haale.... Naathhan dhanyan

Aakaashatthinumoozhikkum-thaangaayeedum
Balavaanekkanyakayenti vishvaasatthodu villikoottum
Paathakikallkkaayu avall praarththhippoo thalpraarththhana
Haale....Nammodukoode

Enneykkum nilanilkkatte-kanyaathvatthil
Rakshakanaam mashihaanyapane ppetteeshan than maathaavaayu
Vaazhvattollaam-kanyakayude perunnaallavall than
Haale....Praarththhana sharanam

Shleehanmaare villichevam-moraanarulli
Viduvin purajaathikallude vazhi-shamaraayanmaarude ganavum
Shaapam nirayum-peeshanmaar thannupadesham
Haale......Theendeedaruthe

Sahadenmaare muntirithan-kulayenna vidham
Nyaayaadhiparittu pizhinyu-rudhiram dharayilozhukkiyaho
Baliyaayore-mudiyaniyichadhipathi Daivam
Haale.... Vishutharaakki.

Pakalon panimathiyivayekkaall-mahitham kaamyam
Maartthommaa! Nin dukrono-pakalon pakalollithookunnu
Panimathi raavil-nee raapakal minneedunnu
Haale....Praarththhana sharanam

Kartthaavettam mahaneeyan vismayaneeyan
Valuthaanaazhchayilaadyadinam-vishvaasattho-
Dathinepaalippon dhanyan-moraan kabareennannettu
Jaathikallannaall-ettuparanyu thrithvatthe
Haale...Ekan Daivam

Sangkeertthanamanpatthonnil-paadi nibiyaam
Daaveedarachan sarvveshaa!-ennodaardratha thonnaname,
Kazhukanamenne malinatha maayichudayone!
Haale.....Krpacheyyaname.

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname-kaikkollllaname.
Shushrooshakallum praarththhanayum-poraattatthil sahaden-
Maarkkadhikam veeryam-nalkiya ninkrpa nyangallkkum
Haale....Balamekatte.

Kartthaavaameeshomashihaa!-ninsharanatthil
Mrthiyaal vishramamaarnnoraam janakabhraathaakkanmaarkkum
Ninraajyatthi-arhatha nalkuka ninpriyaraam
Haale.....Vimalarkkoppam

Pakalellaam nyaan pralapichu haale-
Asthhi thallarnnathimaunam poondan

Manujasnehi! Nee sandhyaykkabraahaamin
Villi kettu girishibiratthil ninne nyangall-villicheedumee
Sandhyaykkanpin-kadale! Varane thunanalkaan
Haale..... Krpa cheyyaname.

Krpa nedaanaayaathmaavum-dehavumonni-
Chinnippoll villikoottunnu-
Verpettaal paapattheyortthonnichevam-praarththhippaanidayillallo
Haale............ Krpa thonnaname.

Eeshaa! Naathhaa! Varika thunappaan villikoottunnu
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallmel krpacheyyenam

Mannil sooryan thanprabhamaayum saayamkaalam
Srashdaave! Ninsthothram paadaan nalkuka deepthi
Daivathanoojaa! Nin thirumozhiyen kaalinu deepam
Sooryannokkum thalprabhayil nyaan nadakollllenam,

Nyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! / Ninte karunayude vaathil nyangallude nere nee adaykkaruthe / kartthaave! Nyangall paapikallaakunnu /  ennu nyangall ettu parayunnu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
Kartthaave! Ninte maranatthaal / nyangallude maranam maayikkappeduvaanaayittu / ninte sneham ninte sthhaanatthuninnu nyangallude adukkalekku ninne irakkikkondu vannu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
